content.raw: I can think of two options: either the individual `ignition` projects each have their own `tutorials` directory, or we create a master repo `ignitionrobotics/tutorials` for all the projects' tutorials. I'd lean more towards giving each project its own tutorials directory, but maybe that makes the website creation more difficult?
content.html: I can think of two options: either the individual ignition projects each have their own tutorials directory, or we create a master repo ignitionrobotics/tutorials for all the projects' tutorials. I'd lean more towards giving each project its own tutorials directory, but maybe that makes the website creation more difficult?
